jd: Job Description -Role: .Net ArchitectLocation: Columbus, OH (hybrid) Need Local candidates Visa- NO opt/cpt/h1bNeed LinkedInNeed at least 12+ Years of profile Primary work objectives: MHAS is looking for a skilled IT Consultant to refactor an existing custom .net/C# Human Resources software suite hosted on Azure to meet the needs of our Agency and constituents.
